sub_title: Head of PQMS & Audit, EDI Business, PD Cluster  at Philips Medical Systems Nederland B.V., Netherlands
summary:
• A dynamic, highly-skilled, and accomplished Quality leader with strong leadership skills, having 16 years of experience in Quality Assurance and Regulatory functions. 
• An effective communicator with excellent relationship management skills and strong analytical, problem solving, and organizational abilities. 
• Presently, Director of PQMS for EDI business, leading a team of 23 QMS & CAPA managers, Internal auditors, Q&R program managers, and Training administrators across multiple business categories and locations 
• Experience working with Top Management and stakeholders to identify QMS scope and content, Process and Product Quality issues and support closure; and to lead process and product improvement activities using Value engineering and Six sigma 
• Experience in QMS definition and change management, Internal and external audit support, FDA remediation, CAPA facilitation, Software, and System Quality Assurance, Approbation/Regulatory and Software tool validation for both NPSS and R&D/Manufacturing. 
• Experienced in planning and defining QMS in compliance with external standards and regulations, including FDA 21CFR820, ISO 13485, EU MDR, EU MDD, ISO 14971, IEC 62366, IEC 62304, MEDDEV 
• Experienced in planning and defining QMS in compliance with standardized PEPF and PIL framework 
• Experienced in the deployment of QMS to ensure compliance in large, full lifecycle projects involving the development of System (hardware/software), stand-alone software, and software solutions 
• Supported country product registrations for medical devices in EU(MDD), USA, Singapore, Australia 
• Experienced in managing Routine and Unannounced Notified body audits, QMS Scope extension audits, Technical File audits 
• Experienced in auditing projects in the capacity of Lead auditor for ISO 13485:2003 
• Experienced in planning and conducting training to employees on Quality Management System

school.name: The National Institute of Engineering, Mysore

courses.name: Overview on Regulatory Requirement - IEC/EN 60601-1 2nd and 3rd edition requirements and testing's

profile_positions.description:
•	Lead and guide a team of 23 resources, with diverse roles and grades across India, Israel, Germany, The Netherlands, and the USA. The team includes roles such as QMS managers, CAPA facilitators, Internal auditors, Q&R program managers, and TEDS administrators.
•	Engage the EDI cross-functional leadership team and the Q&R capability leaders to ensure fully compliant QMS’s are established and maintained across EDI categories while aligning to the Philips PEPF standardized processes and PIL tool landscape
•	Deployed the standardized process and tool for validation of NPSS tools and R&D/Manufacturing tools 
•	Ensure that transformations are identified, planned, and managed across EDI, E.g. update of QMS to EU MDR, Consolidation of LM/QMS/MS in EDI, etc.
•	Ensure that any Philips, Business, and Regulatory needs are met by the PQMS team
•	Successfully led the QMS team to define an EU MDR compliant QMS with successful certification for CI business as per plan
profile_positions.title: Head of PQMS & Audit, EDI Business, PD Cluster

profile_positions.description:
Undertook additional responsibility to:
•	Lead a team of QMS managers across the Netherlands, Israel, and North America, to establish and manage changes to respective organization’s QMS.
•	Responsible to drive harmonization and standardization of Processes and Tools across 3 Business Units in Healthcare Informatics BG.
•	Regularly interact and collaborate with stakeholders to facilitate training and development of competency of team members
profile_positions.title: QMS Manager Team Lead, Healthcare Informatics Business

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for establishing and managing QMS in line with Internal and External requirements including applicable standards and regulations 
•	Experience in creating Quality plans to drive implementation of significant changes to the organization’s QMS, i.e. EU MDR certification, MDSAP certification, QMS harmonization, Relocation of site
•	Responsible for ensuring validity and continuity of ISO 13485, MDSAP, EC certificates in the organization by means of successful Notified Body audits
•	Responsible to report KPIs to the Top management in the Quality System Management Reviews, to identify improvement actions and check adequacy, suitability, and effectiveness of the organization’s QMS.
•	Responsible for planning and facilitating Internal audits to evaluate the effectiveness of QMS 
•	Single point of contact for validation of software tools in the organization.
•	Lead and manage Organization level continuous improvement activities, e.g. Tool maintenance and archival
•	Support Quality assurance activities in projects on need basis as a Quality officer
profile_positions.title: QMS Manager, Cardiology Informatics Business Category

profile_positions.description:
Worked as Q&R Lead for Hospital To Home Business Unit, Q&R Engineer for Africa Ventures, a.i. Q&R Engineer for Radiology solutions BU
•	Responsible for establishing QMS in line with standards such as ISO 13485, FDA 21CFR820, EU Medical Device Directives, ISO 14971, IEC 62304, and IEC 62366 in multiple businesses and locations. 
•   Responsible for deployment of QMS and compliance of design control process across multiple sites, i.e. manage project DHF, review and approve engineering changes, design control deliverables
•   Supported remediation of FDA issues as an outcome of Inspection
•   Performed Quality and Regulatory assurance activities for 
    o	System development products - Motiva Scale
    o	Software development projects - Motiva Solution, eCareCompanion, HL7 interface etc.
    o	Hand-held medical devices in low resource settings of Africa markets - ChARM, Fetal Doppler
•   Responsible for CE marking of Motiva Solution, and Motiva Scale, i.e. Creation of Technical file, IEC 62304 report, Usability Engineering File as per IEC 62366
•   Responsible for Regulatory registration of Motiva Scale, Motiva Solution accessories in Singapore and Motiva Scale in Australia
•   Conduct Internal audits in Bangalore Site as a Certified Lead Auditor for ISO 13485:2003 and participate in external compliance audits
•   Contribute to Organization level continuous improvement activities, i.e. creation of Business level QMS, Optimization of Process Compliance check tool, internal audit tracker tool, and metrics list etc.
•   Conducted Corrective and Preventive actions for Product and Process related issues.
•   Successfully executed Value engineering projects and achieved cost optimization of ChARM product
profile_positions.title: Sr Technical Specialist - Quality and Regulatory

profile_positions.description:
Design Quality Engineer for New Product Development projects of Infant warmer and Infant Incubator in Philips Healthcare - Mother and Child Care Business Unit. 
•	Responsible for establishing QMS in line with standards such as ISO 13485, FDA 21CFR820, EU Medical Device Directives, ISO 14971, IEC 62304, IEC 62366, and CMMi in multiple businesses and locations. 
•	Responsible for deployment of QMS and compliance of design control process across multiple sites, i.e. manage project design history file, review and approve engineering changes, design control deliverables
•	Supported CE marking of Jeev Warmer by helping to create the Technical file, IEC 62304 report, Usability Engineering File as per IEC 62366
•	Conduct Internal audits in Bangalore Site as a Certified Lead Auditor for ISO 13485:2003 and participate in external compliance audits
•	Successfully executed Value engineering projects and realized set targets for cost reduction of Jeev Warmer Electrical BOM as part of Six-Sigma DFSS project
profile_positions.title: Technical Specialist - Quality

company.name: Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions Limited

profile_positions.description:
•	Team lead for Metrics Team for the Organization’s Engineering Process Group
•	Conducted process audits for projects as Internal auditor for CMMI, ISO 9001:2000, ISO 14001:2004
•	Developed Simulation and CART based Process Performance Models in line with QPM requirement of CMMI Ver1.2
•	Developed a mathematical model using Monte Carlo Simulation and simulated failure of ACS product resulting from the sensitivity of components to temperature and pressure 
•	Led a team for optimization of metrics program in organization
profile_positions.title: Senior Officer - Quality

profile_positions.description:
•	Design Quality Engineer for medical devices such as ‘Planet 55’ – 10 parameter Patient monitor, ‘Star 55’ – 5 parameter patient monitor, 3/5 Lead ECG, Climate control System for Operation theatre
•	Statistical analyst and lead for Metrics analysis program in the organization
•	Responsible for planning, coordinating, and monitoring QMS & process training for new employees
